in a way that shows confusion: She chewed her fingernails perplexedly. The audience waited perplexedly for one of the actors to start speaking.
More examplesFewer examplesA porter was waiting perplexedly beside the taxi that she had ordered.He stared into the empty box and scratched his head perplexedly.He looked perplexedly at the green liquid that the waiter had put on the table.The assistant peered perplexedly at her computer screen and asked me to repeat my name and address.
